HEMAscRaper 2.0.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Generate Achievements

    generate_achievements.Rd

    External function to generate achievements for HEMA ratings. This function retrieves data from the specified path or uses package data as a fallback. It computes achievements by invoking all functions prefixed with `ach_` in the namespace of the `HEMAscRaper` package.

    generate_achievements(path = "./hema_ratings", export_csv = FALSE)

    Arguments

    path

    Character. Path to the folder containing HEMA data files. Defaults to "./hema_ratings".

    export_csv

    Logical. If TRUE, exports the achievements list as a CSV to path.

    Value

    A data frame containing all achievements, with columns:

    fighter_id

    ID of the fighter.

    tier_id

    Numeric tier ID (1-4).

    achieved

    Logical, TRUE if achieved.

    percentile

    Proportion of fighters who achieved this tier.

    achievement_tier

    Character. Tier name ("Bronze", "Silver", etc.).

    achievement_name

    Character. Name of the achievement.

    achievement_description

    Character. Description of the achievement.

    achievement_icon

    Character. Icon file name for the achievement.

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
generate_achievements("./hema_ratings")
} # }
